results.overview: Alesha Popovich has to catch Tugarin Zmey and bring back the stolen money with the help of a talking Horse (which talks all the time and has an opinion on everything), a wise granny, a donkey and a beauty Lyubava.
results.title: Alesha Popovich and Tugarin the Dragon

results.overview: José Sirgado is a low-budget filmmaker whose heroin addiction distorts his perspective of the real world. Although he is a depressed and unstable individual, his mood improves when he receives the mysterious films of Pedro, with whom he shares his passion for cinema.
results.title: Rapture

results.original_title: Notre ami l'atome  : un siècle de radioactivité
results.overview: The exciting story of the splitting of the atom, a scientific breakthrough of incalculable importance that ushered in the nuclear age, has a dark side: the many events in which people were exposed to radiation, both intentionally and by accident.
results.title: 100 Years of the Atom

results.overview: Alice, married for the last 20 years to a taxi driver, works in a beauty parlour, has three children, the eldest of whom is doing his military service, and a mother who works as a maid in her house. None of the three siblings pay much attention to their mother, and they treat their grandmother with lack of respect. Alice's life in the female working world contrasts strongly with the powerful masculine presence in her home. Although she's a good girl, the chance to betray uncovers other betrayals she didn't know existed.
results.title: Alice's House

results.overview: A gambling addict faces a conflict when entrusted with keeping a bunch of money that isn't his.
results.title: Win It All

results.overview: A young widow still grieving over the death of her husband finds herself being comforted by a local housepainter.
results.title: Moonlight and Valentino

results.overview: When his flight is delayed coming home from a business trip, Keith Mitchell has to leave his daughter Alexis, who’s stuck at home under house arrest, alone for the night. Once Keith is finally in the air with full bars of WiFi, he notices a stranger enter the house on his security system. Unable to warn Alexis when the WiFi suddenly cuts out, Keith sits helpless from 30,000 feet in the air while his daughter fights for her life.
results.title: You're Not Alone

results.overview: An AWOL marine in possession of secret government information, is a wanted man, pursued by Russian special ops, the LAPD, and a dangerous assassin.
results.title: AWOL-72

results.overview: An undercover cop is forced to team up with a group of unlikely allies to take down a drug smuggling ring.
results.title: Undercover Punch and Gun

results.overview: Thirty-something Vítor still lives with his mother, Fátima, in his grandmother Júlia’s apartment. Fátima is a hairdresser with a quiet disposition who, at night, fantasises about the policeman who has just moved in next door. By day, Vítor is a lowly employee on a TV show. But at night, he dons his neighbour’s uniform to win the favour and satisfy the desires of a boy he’s met online. In her retirement home, Júlia is unable to sleep at night and has long forgotten what drugs she is meant to be taking. She misses her dead husband, who manifests himself in the body of a living friend, and gets involved in her daily activities. Through these characters, Diogo Costa Amarante constructs a fascinating portrait of lives lived while desires remain unrealised.
results.title: We Are on Air

results.overview: Chava, a 17-year-old boy who has a secret admirer, feels more attracted to boys. When leaving his school in a rainy day, Carlos offers him a ride, and so their adventure begins.
results.title: Tell Me About Yourself

results.overview: Elizabeth's engagement plans are thrown into disarray when her fiancée's free-spirited brother David returns home. David's unexpected influence prompts Elizabeth to question her life decisions.
results.title: It Was Always You

results.overview: Tobacco heiress Doris Duke develops an unlikely friendship with her butler, Bernard Lafferty.
results.title: Bernard and Doris

results.original_title: Top Gear France - Road Trip en Allemagne
results.overview: The new hosts of Top Gear France are racing in the Nürburgring motorsports complex in Germany to celebrate their first episode.
results.title: Top Gear France - Vilebrequin in Germany

results.original_title: EKOEKO AZARAK エコエコアザラク
results.overview: The fourth movie in the highly sucessful Eko Eko Azarak series. Following the events of the second movie, Misa discovers, along with the rest of Japan, the strength of her newly acquired powers when she and her friends are attacked in the woods…
results.title: Eko Eko Azarak: Awakening

results.overview: A grittily realistic tale of prostitution at an Eastern European border town
results.title: Made in Ash

results.original_title: 1½ Ritter - Auf der Suche nach der hinreißenden Herzelinde
results.overview: The story of Lanze who is in love with the princess. One day the princess is kidnapped by the Dark Knight and Lanze starts his journey to rescue her. But he is not alone because Erdal, a turk, joins him on his journey.
results.title: 1½ Knights - In Search of the Ravishing Princess Herzelinde

results.overview: A devout community suffering from a plague is torn apart by a beautiful young woman and the forces of witchcraft, black magic, and possession.
results.title: The Curse of Audrey Earnshaw

results.original_title: Se Deus Vier Que Venha Armado
results.overview: A young man on leave from prison, his straitlaced brother, his best friend, a rookie cop and a young actress collide over the course of 72 hours.
results.title: If God Comes Let Him Bring a Gun

results.original_title: La Redota: una historia de Artigas
results.overview: In 1884, the famous painter Juan Manuel Blanes, from Uruguay, is asked to create a portrait of José Artigas. There is only one drawing of his face, done in his old age so Blanes must imagine what he looked like by reading up on his ideas and learning about his life.
results.title: The Story of Artigas
